desc: The Work-Life Balance Card Sort will help you clarify what you want and need in your career and life to feel happier, healthier and more fulfilled. Developed by Anush Hansen, MA, MPH, Licensed Professional Counselor and Certified Career Counselor.

layout.text: Simple tools for helping discover career fulfillment, work-life balance & wellness.
TAKE THE DIGITAL WORK-LIFE BALANCE ASSESSMENT
